game_description: Best Truck Driving Simulation in Meta Quest Platform. First Driving game with fully rotatable steering wheel and Manual gear system. Great for learning heavy vehicle driving. Multiple levels with hair-pin bends and challenging turns. New levels will be unlocked on winning each level. Trucks with different steering positions. Download and enjoy this awesome truck driving experience.
review_1: Love the update the only problem I had was shifting was a little glitchy
review_2: Is this game ever gonna receive an update
review_3: Truck drive ing sim was so cool to see it’s a bit glitchy but updates and the likes will fix this it’s amazing and fun from the start. Things are finally going well and it’s thanks to developers like these people. we’ll done love this and will keep and eye on progress. I tested it and upload a video short on my YouTube channel to try to help with getting people interested people mostly don’t know much about this kinda thing I hope I’m helping I love learning and simulation vr it’s amazing so good work developers!!
review_4: Thank you all for downloading and supporting this game. Spend 5 to 10 minutes for this game and you can master it. Learn how to use brake and put the correct gear during turns. Thank you all for considering this game. You may contact me on maddytroupe@gmail.com Enjoy!!
